amendment.description: Amendment increases funding by $25 million for Defense Production Act purchases of strategic radiation hardened microelectronics under the Trusted Foundry Sustainment Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Paulsen amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Paulsen.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Paulsen amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
